|rule|Species Clause: Limit one of each Pokémon
|rule|HP Percentage Mod: HP is shown in percentages
|rule|Sleep Clause Mod: Limit one foe put to sleep
|rule|Dynamax Clause: You cannot dynamax
|rule|Camomons Mod: Pokémon have their types set to match their first two moves.
|rule|Inverse Mod: Weaknesses become resistances, while resistances and immunities become weaknesses.
|rule|Scalemons Mod: Every Pokemon's stats, barring HP, are scaled to come as close to a BST of 600 as possible
